org.usfirst.frc2084.CMonster2014.drive

Class DriveAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc2084.CMonster2014.drive.DriveAlgorithm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArcadeDriveAlgorithm, MecanumDriveAlgorithm

    public abstract class DriveAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a bridge between a HID (joystick, gamepad) and a DriveController. It takes input and uses it to control the robot through different algorithms. This class cannot be used directly and must be extended to provide functionality. A drive algorithm does not have to worry about where the wheels are in most cases, because this is taken care of by the DriveController.
    Author:
    Ben Wolsieffer
    See Also:
    ArcadeDriveAlgorithm, MecanumDriveAlgorithm, DriveController
